intro.title: Plan Your Response
intro.description: Reflect on whether your goals align with your values, then plan your words, tone, and desired outcome. This preparation helps you communicate effectively while staying true to what matters most to you.

sections.title: Align with Your Values
sections.placeholder: How do your goals align with your core values? What values are you honoring by pursuing these goals?

sections.title: Plan Your Words
sections.placeholder: What specific words or phrases will you use? How will you express your needs clearly and respectfully?

sections.title: Plan Your Tone
sections.placeholder: What tone will you use? How will you convey respect, assertiveness, and openness?

sections.title: Desired Outcome
sections.placeholder: What is your ideal outcome? What would success look like for this interaction?

subsections.title: What are the strengths of your plan?
subsections.placeholder: What aspects of your planned approach feel strong and aligned with your goals?

subsections.title: What potential challenges do you anticipate?
subsections.placeholder: What obstacles or difficulties might you encounter? How will you handle them?

subsections.title: What adjustments might you need to make?
subsections.placeholder: Based on your reflection, what changes or improvements would strengthen your plan?
